cards.title: Natural Wonders
cards.description: Experience the iconic Whale's Tail sandbar, witness humpback whale migrations, and explore pristine beaches.

cards.title: Lifestyle & Culture
cards.description: Embrace the Pura Vida lifestyle in our vibrant communities, where nature and modern comfort coexist.

cards.title: Activities & Adventures
cards.description: From surfing and hiking to waterfall rappelling, discover endless possibilities for adventure.
